content:
Dr. Xiaoliang FAN got a Ph.D degree in Computer Science from University Pierre and Marie Curie (now Sorbonne Université) in France in 2012. Now he works at Fujian Key Lab of Sensing and Computing for Smart Cities (Xiamen University) as a Senior Research Specialist. His research interests include Spatio-temporal Data Mining, Privacy-preserving Computing & AI algorithms. He has published 60+ journal (IEEE TMC/TITS/TSC, etc.) and conference (AAAI, IJCAI, UbiComp, etc.) papers, and has obtained/ applied for 8/14 Chinese invention patents. His works are funded by NSFC and many industry collaborators. Dr. FAN is an IEEE Senior Member, and CCF (China Computer Federation) Senior Member.
 Download my resumé. --
summary: Dr. Xiaoliang FAN got a Ph.D degree in Computer Science from University Pierre and Marie Curie (now Sorbonne Université) in France in 2012. Now he works at Fujian Key Lab of Sensing and Computing for Smart Cities (Xiamen University) as a Senior Research Specialist.
title: cheng wang

content:
Nelson Bighetti is a professor of artificial intelligence at the Stanford AI Lab. His research interests include distributed robotics, mobile computing and programmable matter. He leads the Robotic Neurobiology group, which develops self-reconfiguring robots, systems of self-organizing robots, and mobile sensor networks.
